required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Virtual-reality Based Approach to Improve Behavioral Weight Management Outcomes
clinical_study.official_title: A Virtual-reality Based Approach to Improve Behavioral Weight Management Outcomes

lead_sponsor.agency: California Polytechnic State University-San Luis Obispo

clinical_study.source: California Polytechnic State University-San Luis Obispo

brief_summary.textblock: A pilot randomized trial was done to test the feasibility integrating virtual reality (VR) into standard behavioral weight loss treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants with overweight or obesity are randomly assigned to a 4-week Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Non-Weight-Related VR app (i.e., Control Group) or Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Weight-Related VR app (i.e., Intervention Group). The Intervention's VR tool was designed to enable practice of behavioral skills taught in weekly group meetings, including managing social and home environmental cues for eating and activity.

primary_outcome.description: Participant satisfaction ratings of virtual reality scenarios on a scale where 1 = very dissatisfied to 4 = very satisfied

secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants who complete the final assessment divided by the number of participants enrolled at baseline

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Non-Weight-Related VR app
arm_group.description: The VR tool was an attention control and was not weight related.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Weight-Related VR app
arm_group.description: The Intervention's VR tool was designed to enable practice of behavioral skills taught in weekly group meetings, including managing social and home environmental cues for eating and activity.

intervention.intervention_name: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Non-Weight-Related VR app
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Non-Weight-Related VR app

intervention.intervention_name: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Weight-Related VR app
intervention.description: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Weight-Related VR app
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard Behavioral Weight Loss plus Weight-Related VR app

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Non-pregnant Adults (age > 18 years) Overweight or obesity (BMI â‰¥ 25) Able to speak and read in English. Available on Thursday evenings Have an iPhone 6 or higher
Exclusion Criteria:
Self-reported serious psychological problems or medical problems

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: California Polytechnic State University-San Luis Obispo
